text:
1) Patch to getSheet that makes the comparison betwen the passed in sheet name
and the sheet names in the workbook case insensitive.  Excel doesn't care about
case, apparently.

2) Make getWorkbook a public function to allow resolution of external refs when
using the formula parser from a HSSFWorkbook.
creator: eladner@goldinc.com
poi-support@buni.org
text: Please split this patch.  I'll apply #1, #2 is -1 from me.  We need a better way.
